name: Drawing for kids
description: Pencil drawing for kids under age of 5. Kids must have color pencils and basic drawing stationary with them.

name: Sketching session
description: Learn how to sketch human faces and many more. Age must be 5+. Initially HB pencils and other materials will be given as class progresses.

name: Outdoor painting
description: We choose different location for outdoor paintings. Age must be 11+.

name: Knife painting
description: Paint knife is required. Age must be 16+.
